content.text:
# Invasion of Poland (disambiguation)

Invasion of Poland may refer to:
10th century invasions of Poland:
* (972) Battle of Cedynia,  invasion of Poland by Odo I, Margrave of the Saxon Ostmark
11th century invasions of Poland:
* (1028–1031) German–Polish War, invasion of Poland by Conrad II
* (1038–1039) Bretislav's invasion, invasion of Poland by Bretislav I
12th century invasions of Poland:
* (1109) Henry V's expedition to Poland, invasion of Poland by Henry V
* (1157) Frederick I's expedition to Głogów, invasion of Poland by Frederick I Barbarossa
13th century invasions of Poland:
*(1205) Battle of Zawichost, invasion of Poland by Roman the Great
*(1209) Battle of Lubusz (1209), invasion of Poland by Conrad II, Margrave of Lusatia
*(1240–1241) First Mongol invasion of Poland, invasion of Poland by Subutai
*(1259–1260) Second Mongol invasion of Poland, invasion of Poland by Nogai Khan
*(1287–1288) Third Mongol invasion of Poland, invasion of Poland by Talabuga Khan
14th century invasions of Poland:
* (1308) Teutonic takeover of Danzig (Gdańsk), invasion of Poland by Heinrich von Plötzke
* (1376) Lithuanian raid on Poland, invasion of Poland by Kęstutis
15th century invasions of Poland:
* (1409–1411) Polish–Lithuanian — Teutonic War, invasion of Poland by Ulrich von Jungingen
* (1431–1435) Polish — Teutonic War, invasion of Poland by Paul von Rusdorf
* (1454–1466) Thirteen Years' War, invasion of Poland by Bernard Szumborski
* (1467–1479) War of the Priests (Poland), invasion of Poland by Heinrich Reffle von Richtenberg
16th century invasions of Poland:
* (1502–1510) Moldavian–Polish War, invasion of Poland by Bogdan III the One-Eyed
* (1512) Battle of Wisniowiec, invasion of Poland by Meñli I Giray
* (1530–1538) Moldavian–Polish War, invasion of Poland by Petru Rareș
* (1558–1583) Livonian War, invasion of Poland by Ivan IV the Terrible
* (1563–1570) Northern Seven Years' War, invasion of Poland by Eric XIV
* (1587–1588) War of the Polish Succession, invasion of Poland by Maxilmilian III of Austria
17th century invasions of Poland:
* (1600-1611) Polish–Swedish War, invasion of Poland by Charles IX
* (1606) Battle of Udycz, invasion of Poland by Khan Temir
* (1617–1618) Polish–Swedish War, invasion of Poland by Gustavus Adolphus
* (1620–1621) Polish–Ottoman War, invasion of Poland by Osman II
* (1621–1625) Polish–Swedish War, invasion of Poland by Gustavus Adolphus
* (1624) Battle of Martynów, invasion of Poland by Khan Temir
* (1626–1629) Polish–Swedish War, invasion of Poland by Gustavus Adolphus
* (1632–1634) Smolensk War, invasion of Poland by Mikhail Shein
* (1633–1634) Polish–Ottoman War, invasion of Poland by Abaza Mehmed Pasha
* (1644) Battle of Ochmatów, invasion of Poland by Tugay Bey
* (1654–1667) Russo-Polish War, invasion of Poland by Aleksey Trubetskoy
* (1655–1660) Second Northern War, invasion of Poland by Charles X Gustav
* (1666–1671) Polish — Cossack–Tatar War, invasion of Poland by Petro Doroshenko
* (1672–1676) Polish–Ottoman War, invasion of Poland by Mehmed IV
18th century invasion of Poland:
* (1700–1721) Great Northern War, invasion of Poland by Peter the Great and Charles XII
* (1701–1706) Swedish invasion of Poland, invasion of Poland by Charles XII
* (1715–1716) Tarnogród Confederation, invasion of Poland by Peter the Great and Augustus II the Strong
* (1733–1735) War of the Polish Succession, invasion of Poland by Peter Lacy
* (1768–1769) Koliivshchyna, invasion of Poland by Maksym Zalizniak
* (1768–1772) Bar Confederation, invasion of Poland by Alexander Suvorov
* (1772) First Partition of Poland, invasion of Poland by Frederick the Great and Catherine II
* (1792) Polish–Russian War of 1792, invasion of Poland by Mikhail Krechetnikov
* (1793) Second Partition of Poland, invasion of Poland by Catherine II
* (1795) Third Partition of Poland, invasion of Poland by Catherine II and Frederick William II
19th century invasions of Poland:
* (1809) Austro-Polish War, invasion of Poland by Archduke Ferdinand Karl Joseph of Austria-Este
20th century invasions of Poland:
* (1905–1907) Revolution in the Kingdom of Poland, invasion of Poland by Sergei Witte
* (1918–1919) Polish–Ukrainian War, invasion of Poland by Yevhen Petrushevych
* (1919–1921) Polish–Soviet War, invasion of Poland by Vladimir Lenin
* (1939) Invasion of Poland, invasion of Poland by Adolf Hitler, Joseph Stalin and Ferdinand Čatloš
* (1945) Vistula–Oder offensive, invasion of Poland by Georgy Zhukov
